Centroid = ({1:NUMERICAL:= 6.0#Excellent!~*#I'm sorry} , {1:NUMERICAL:= 29.5#Excellent!~*#I'm sorry}) mm

Calculate the second moments of inertia of the given area with respect to both x and y.

Give your answer to the nearest whole number and in mm4.

Ix = {2:NUMERICAL:=205379:2054#Excellent!~*#I'm sorry} mm4

Iy = {2:NUMERICAL:=8496:85#Excellent!~*#I'm sorry} mm4

generalfeedback.text: The shape is symmetric in both x and y, so the centroid is right in the middle of the area.
